Comment: Abilities: A06U (Mind Confusion), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: The hero's masterful trickery stops enemy units from attacking for a short period of time. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Small area, lasts 3(2) seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Medium area, lasts 4(2.75) seconds. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Large area, lasts 5(3.5) seconds.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Very large area, lasts 6(4.25) seconds.
